price: Then the wrongdoers were totally exterminated. And all praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْۚ وَٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
